name: Huntington Beach
shortDescription: Famous for its iconic pier, surf culture, and vibrant coastal lifestyle.
fullDescription: Huntington Beach, known as 'Surf City USA,' is a lively coastal city with miles of sandy beaches, world-class surfing, and a vibrant downtown. It offers family-friendly parks, an active arts scene, and numerous outdoor activities. With excellent schools and a diverse community, Huntington Beach combines beachside relaxation with urban conveniences.

neighborhoods.name: Seal Beach
neighborhoods.description: Quaint beach town with charming shops, a historic pier, and calm beaches.

neighborhoods.name: Costa Mesa
neighborhoods.description: Urban city known for arts, shopping, and diverse dining options.

neighborhoods.name: Newport Beach
neighborhoods.description: Upscale coastal city with luxury homes, boating, and pristine beaches.

neighborhoods.name: Huntington Harbour
neighborhoods.description: Waterfront community featuring canals, luxury homes, and boating access.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Canals and homes in Huntington Harbour

highlights.title: Huntington Beach Pier
highlights.description: Iconic pier popular for fishing, surfing, and scenic ocean views.

highlights.title: Surfing Culture
highlights.description: Host of the U.S. Open of Surfing and a hub for surfers worldwide.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Surfers riding waves at Huntington Beach

highlights.title: Bolsa Chica Ecological Reserve
highlights.description: Protected wetlands ideal for birdwatching, hiking, and nature walks.

highlights.title: Family-Friendly Beaches
highlights.description: Wide sandy beaches with amenities and safe swimming areas for families.

faqs.question: What is Huntington Beach famous for?
faqs.answer: Huntington Beach is famous for its surfing culture, iconic pier, and beautiful beaches.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Huntington Beach?
faqs.answer: The city is served by Huntington Beach Union High School District and several highly rated elementary and middle schools.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are popular?
faqs.answer: Surfing, beach volleyball, biking along the coast, and nature walks at Bolsa Chica Reserve are popular activities.

faqs.question: How is the commute to Los Angeles?
faqs.answer: Huntington Beach offers direct access to the 405 and 22 freeways, with typical commutes to LA ranging from 45 to 75 minutes depending on traffic.
